system.description: Any nonevil creature within the area suffers cumulative effects by HD: equal to caster level — dazed (1 round); up to caster level -1 — weakened (Str -2d6 for 2d4 rounds), dazed; up to caster level -5 — paralyzed (1d10 min.), weakened, dazed; up to caster level -10 — killed (living die, undead destroyed), paralyzed, weakened, dazed. No save. On your home plane, nonevil extraplanar creatures are banished (Will -4 negates); banished creatures cannot return for 24 hours. Creatures with HD exceeding your caster level are unaffected.
system.target: Nonevil creatures in 40-ft.-radius spread centered on you
system.savingThrow: None or Will negates; see text
